mention.text: smokers of 10 to 20 cigarettes a day
director of the Cancer Epidemiology Unit at the University of Edinburgh
a statistician at the National Heart
Professor Nicholas Wald of St. Bartholemew 's Hospital in London
the balance of evidence suggests that smoking may cause leukemia
data collected from 248,000 veterans between 1954 and 1969
